intro: The sun, the sea and a wedding in peril!?
description:
Kate and Nicole Robinson hit up Hawaii for a very special occassion: the wedding of their good friend Stella!
Kate's got a date with with Hawaii! 
In this Hidden Object game with a tropical twist, see all the local sights, experience all the local favorites and maybe even give your good friend Stella the best wedding ever!

-Return to your favorite Hawaiian spots as much as you like in Unlimited Mode!
-Tons of clever mini-games to master!
-Fun Facts about Hawaii
